channel.title: How do i add barrage for staff only?without using staff
channel.description: i need help. can someone tell me how to make a command that lets staff and only staff use barrage? like lets say if barrage command was ::loser (name) it will brrage them. so if u can help me that will be big help ty.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2009, 02:39:30 pm[/size][hr]by without using staff i mean ancient staff and all that.
